author: Matt Bassil
description:
Legendary Pokémon are iconic - they have the most elaborate designs, the best videogame stats, and some of the mightiest Pokémon cards. While all Mythical and Legendary Pokémon were once few in number, each new game has added more - so we've created this handy list of all 71 Legendaries and 23 Mythicals you can catch or collect.

Continue reading All Legendary Pokémon and Mythical Pokémon in order
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: All Legendary Pokémon and Mythical Pokémon in order

author: Mollie Russell
description:
For a long time, my DnD sessions have been afflicted by the curse of ugly maps. Hand-drawing battle maps is an arduous process that rewards you with wonky, inconsistent, or downright hard-to-understand handouts. Luckily, someone else in the D&D community has seen this need and decided to fill it. For around a year now, TTRPG creator Arkana Tools has been developing a Paper Map Generator that makes it easy to print to-scale battlemaps – for free.

Continue reading As a Dungeon Master, this free DnD tool solves almost all of my map problems
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: As a Dungeon Master, this free DnD tool solves almost all of my map problems

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Every character and creature in Dungeons and Dragons is assigned one of six different DnD sizes - crucial categories that define how much space they take up on a map, which weapons they can carry, and more. This guide explains all the sizes 5e rules from across the core rulebooks, and it includes a handy DnD size chart you can reference.

Continue reading DnD sizes explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD sizes explained

author: Alex Evans
description:
The Warhammer 40k Astra Militarum army - a.k.a. the Imperial Guard - is among the oldest and most popular playable factions in Games Workshop's sci-fi wargame. An enormous force of trillions of regular humans, the Guard are humanity's first defence. This complete guide now includes full details of the new 2025 Astra Militarum codex, as well as the brand new Death Korps of Krieg models - so read on for everything you need to collect and play Imperial Guard in 10th Edition!

Continue reading Warhammer 40k Astra Militarum codex, lore, and new models in 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games,
title: Warhammer 40k Astra Militarum codex, lore, and new models in 2025

author: Callum Self
description:
Finding Pokémon Prismatic Evolutions packs in the wild is no easy task. In fact, I’d argue you're more likely to capture a real Eevee than secure a master set of Prismatic at a reasonable price. You can’t afford to miss any restocks of this highly sought-after set, so pay attention, as soon you’ll be able to attempt to grab 14 Prismatic Evolutions packs in one go – alongside some excellent-looking promos.

Continue reading Here's your chance to get 14 Pokémon Prismatic Evolutions packs at retail price
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards,
title: Here's your chance to get 14 Pokémon Prismatic Evolutions packs at retail price

author: Amber Willmott
description:
What is the cutest Pokémon? This question has stumped scholars for millennia. Okay, that’s not true, but it has been the subject of heated debate ever since the first Pokémon card made its way onto the primordial playgrounds of the mid-90s. There are as many ‘cutest Pokémon’ as there are ways to measure cuteness, so we’re going to embrace that diversity – and rank our favorite cute Pokémon, each one shining in its own category of adorability.

Continue reading The 25 cutest Pokémon of all time
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: The 25 cutest Pokémon of all time

author: Mollie Russell
description:
During our first foray into The Night Cage, a friend’s casual comment stuck with me for the entire board game. “It’s funny”, he said. “We’re playing as prisoners in a dreadful place, yet we’re all still willing to work together”.

Continue reading The Night Cage board game reminds us to face real-world horrors together
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: The Night Cage board game reminds us to face real-world horrors together

author: Timothy Linward
description:
The six DnD stats - Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma - represent a character's strengths and weaknesses. Fighters need a high Strength score to swing a blade or wear heavy armor, Wizards need great Intelligence to understand the secrets of magic, and Bards must have plenty of Charisma to charm people with their honeyed words. This comprehensive guide explains all the Dungeons and Dragons stats, what different Ability Score values mean in real world terms, the different systems for generating your stats, and much more besides.

Continue reading DnD stats explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD stats explained

author: Matt Bassil
description:
In case you didn’t already know, Magic: The Gathering’s Standard format is a wreck. Izzet Cauldron decks make up at least 40% of the meta, and the broken combination of Final Fantasy’s Vivi Ornitier and Agatha’s Soul Cauldron has proven simply too powerful for any other deck to contain.

Continue reading Magic: The Gathering's main format is cooked - I'm jumping to Pauper
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Magic: The Gathering's main format is cooked - I'm jumping to Pauper

author: Callum Self
description:
The Mistborn Deckbuilding Game, a rich and thematic adaptation of Brandon Sanderson's novels, is currently on sale over at Amazon. With 15% off, this excellent slice of Mistborn fantasy is cheaper than it's been for some time - and it's certainly worth playing.

Continue reading The Mistborn card game brings your Allomancy fantasies to life, and it's 15% off

title: The Mistborn card game brings your Allomancy fantasies to life, and it's 15% off

author: Timothy Linward
description:
One of the most important parts of the scientific method is publishing failed experiments, demonstrating that a hypothesis was wrong and new lines of enquiry are needed. Now I’m no scientist, but I am an idiot with a high opinion of himself and very little self-control. So when I received a review sample of the Saltgator soft gel injector - MSRP $399 - I saw no issues with trying to jury rig it to melt hard plastic and inject it into molds so I could make Warhammer terrain. Reader, this may surprise you - it did not work.

Continue reading I wrecked a brand new $400 tool trying to make Warhammer terrain
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k gam
title: I wrecked a brand new $400 tool trying to make Warhammer terrain
